chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
ring_theory 0%Z 1%Z Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp eq

Premises:
ring_theory : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> Prop
Inductive eq (A : Type) (x : A) : A -> Prop := eq_refl : x = x Arguments eq {A}%type_scope Arguments eq_refl {A}%type_scope {x}, [A] _
Inductive Z : Set := Z0 : Z | Zpos : positive -> Z | Zneg : positive -> Z Arguments Zpos _%positive_scope Arguments Zneg _%positive_scope
Zr_ring_lemma1 : forall (n : nat) (l : list Z) (lpe : list (Ring_polynom.PExpr Z * Ring_polynom.PExpr Z)) (pe1 pe2 : Ring_polynom.PExpr Z), Ring_polynom.interp_PElist 0%Z 1%Z Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp eq (IDphi (R:=Z)) Z.of_N Z.pow l lpe ->...-> Ring_polynom.PEeval 0%Z 1%Z Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp (IDphi (R:=Z)) Z.of_N Z.pow l pe1 = Ring_polynom.PEeval 0%Z 1%Z Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp (IDphi (R:=Z)) Z.of_N Z.pow l pe2
Zr_ring_lemma2 : forall (n : nat) (lH : list (Ring_polynom.PExpr Z * Ring_polynom.PExpr Z)) (l : list Z), Ring_polynom.interp_PElist 0%Z 1%Z Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp eq (IDphi (R:=Z)) Z.of_N Z.pow l lH -> forall lmp : list (Z * Ring_polynom.Mon * Ring_polynom.Pol Z), Ring_polynom.mk_monpol_list 0%Z 1%Z Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp Zeq_bool Z.quotrem lH = lmp ->...-> Ring_polynom.PEeval 0%Z 1%Z Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp (IDphi (R:=Z)) Z.of_N Z.pow l pe = Ring_polynom.Pphi_pow 0%Z 1%Z Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp 0%Z 1%Z Zeq_bool (IDphi (R:=Z)) Z.of_N Z.pow get_signZ l npe
ZMicromega.normZ = RingMicromega.norm 0%Z 1%Z Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp Zeq_bool : EnvRing.PExpr Z -> EnvRing.Pol Z
Zth = {| Radd_0_l := Z.add_0_l; Radd_comm := Z.add_comm; Radd_assoc := Z.add_assoc; Rmul_1_l := Z.mul_1_l; Rmul_comm := Z.mul_comm; Rmul_assoc := Z.mul_assoc; Rdistr_l := Z.mul_add_distr_r; Rsub_def := fun x y : Z => eq_refl; Ropp_def := Z.sub_diag |} : ring_theory 0%Z 1%Z Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp eq
Rring_ring_lemma1 : forall (R : Type) (Rzero Rone : R) (Rplus Rmult Rminus : R -> R -> R) (Ropp : R -> R), ring_theory Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq ->...-> Ring_polynom.PEeval Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp (gen_phiZ Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Ropp) id_phi_N (pow_N Rone Rmult) l pe1 = Ring_polynom.PEeval Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp (gen_phiZ Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Ropp) id_phi_N (pow_N Rone Rmult) l pe2
ZMicromega.Zeval_formula' = RingMicromega.eval_formula Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp eq Z.le Z.lt (fun x : Z => x) (fun x : N => x) (pow_N 1%Z Z.mul) : RingMicromega.PolEnv Z -> RingMicromega.Formula Z -> Prop
Rring_ring_lemma2 : forall (R : Type) (Rzero Rone : R) (Rplus Rmult Rminus : R -> R -> R) (Ropp : R -> R), ring_theory Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq -> forall (n : nat) (lH : list (Ring_polynom.PExpr Z * Ring_polynom.PExpr Z)) (l : list R), Ring_polynom.interp_PElist Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq (gen_phiZ Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Ropp) id_phi_N (pow_N Rone Rmult) l lH ->...-> Ring_polynom.PEeval Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp (gen_phiZ Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Ropp) id_phi_N (pow_N Rone Rmult) l pe = Ring_polynom.Pphi_dev Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp 0%Z 1%Z Zeq_bool (gen_phiZ Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Ropp) get_signZ l npe
ZMicromega.ZSORaddon = {| RingMicromega.SORrm := {| morph0 := eq_refl; morph1 := eq_refl; morph_add := fun x y : Z => eq_refl; morph_sub := fun x y : Z => eq_refl; morph_mul := fun x y : Z => eq_refl; Ring_theory.morph_opp := fun x : Z => eq_refl; morph_eq := fun (x y : Z) (H : Zeq_bool x y = true) => Zeq_bool_eq x y H |}; RingMicromega.SORpower := {| rpow_pow_N := fun (r : Z) (n : N) => eq_refl |}; RingMicromega.SORcneqb_morph := fun x y : Z => Zeq_bool_neq x y; RingMicromega.SORcleb_morph := Zle_bool_imp_le |} : RingMicromega.SORaddon 0%Z 1%Z Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp eq Z.le 0%Z 1%Z Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp Zeq_bool Z.leb (fun x : Z =>...
ZMicromega.eval_expr = RingMicromega.eval_pexpr Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp (fun x : Z => x) (fun x : N => x) (pow_N 1%Z Z.mul) : RingMicromega.PolEnv Z -> EnvRing.PExpr Z -> Z
gen_phiZ_morph : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> ring_morph rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req 0%Z 1%Z Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp Zeq_bool (gen_phiZ rO rI radd rmul ropp)
ZCoeff.Zring_morph : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> ring_morph rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req 0%Z 1%Z Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp Zeq_bool (ZCoeff.gen_order_phi_Z rO rI rplus rtimes ropp)
Zpower_theory = {| rpow_pow_N := fun (r : Z) (n : N) => match n as n0 return ((r ^ Z.of_N n0)%Z = pow_N 1%Z Z.mul r n0) with | 0%N => eq_refl | N.pos p => eq_ind (pow_pos Z.mul r p * 1)%Z (fun z : Z => Pos.iter (Z.mul r) 1%Z p = z) (positive_ind (fun p0 : positive => forall z : Z, Pos.iter (Z.mul r) z p0 = (pow_pos Z.mul r p0 * z)%Z) (fun (p0 : positive) (IHp : forall z : Z, Pos.iter (Z.mul r) z p0 = (pow_pos Z.mul r p0 * z)%Z) (z : Z) => eq_ind_r (fun z0 : Z => (r * z0)%Z = (r * (pow_pos Z.mul r p0 * pow_pos Z.mul r p0) * z)%Z) (eq_ind_r (fun z0 : Z => (r *...
Ztriv_div_th : forall (R : Type) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req -> forall zphi : Z -> R, div_theory req Z.add Z.mul zphi Z.quotrem
BinIntDef.Z.pow = fun x y : Z => match y with | 0%Z => 1%Z | Z.pos p => BinIntDef.Z.pow_pos x p | Z.neg _ => 0%Z end : Z -> Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.pow (_ _)%Z_scope
ZMicromega.Zsor = {| OrderedRing.SORsetoid := Zsth; OrderedRing.SORplus_wd := fun (x1 x2 : Z) (H : x1 = x2) (y1 y2 : Z) (H0 : y1 = y2) => eq_ind_r (fun x3 : Z => (x3 + y1)%Z = (x2 + y2)%Z) (eq_ind_r (fun y3 : Z => (x2 + y3)%Z = (x2 + y2)%Z) eq_refl H0) H; OrderedRing.SORtimes_wd := fun (x1 x2 : Z) (H : x1 = x2) (y1 y2 : Z) (H0 : y1 = y2) => eq_ind_r (fun x3 : Z => (x3 * y1)%Z = (x2 * y2)%Z) (eq_ind_r (fun y3 : Z => (x2 * y3)%Z = (x2 * y2)%Z) eq_refl H0) H; OrderedRing.SORopp_w...
Z.sub_wd = Morphisms.reflexive_proper Z.sub : Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful Z.eq (Morphisms.respectful Z.eq Z.eq)) Z.sub
Z.opp_wd = Morphisms.reflexive_proper Z.opp : Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful Z.eq Z.eq) Z.opp
Z.add_wd = Morphisms.reflexive_proper Z.add : Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful Z.eq (Morphisms.respectful Z.eq Z.eq)) Z.add
Zmod' = fun a b : Z => match a with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos a' => match b with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos _ => Zmod_POS a' b | Z.neg b' => let r := Zmod_POS a' (Z.pos b') in match r with | 0%Z => 0%Z | _ => (b + r)%Z end end | Z.neg a' => match b with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos _ => let r := Zmod_POS a' b in match r with | 0%Z => 0%Z | _ => (b - r)%Z end | Z.neg b' => (- Zmod_POS a' (Z.pos b'))%Z end end : Z -> Z -> Z Arguments Zmod' (_ _)%Z_scope
BinIntDef.Z.mul = fun x y : Z => match x with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos x' => match y with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos y' => Z.pos (x' * y') | Z.neg y' => Z.neg (x' * y') end | Z.neg x' => match y with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos y' => Z.neg (x' * y') | Z.neg y' => Z.pos (x' * y') end end : Z -> Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.mul (_ _)%Z_scope
Zmod_POS = fix Zmod_POS (a : positive) (b : Z) {struct a} : Z := match a with | (a'~1)%positive => let r := Zmod_POS a' b in let r' := (2 * r + 1)%Z in if (r' <? b)%Z then r' else (r' - b)%Z | (a'~0)%positive => let r := Zmod_POS a' b in let r' := (2 * r)%Z in if (r' <? b)%Z then r' else (r' - b)%Z | 1%positive => if (2 <=? b)%Z then 1%Z else 0%Z end : positive -> Z -> Z Arguments Zmod_POS _%positive_scope _%Z_scope
M22plus_monoid : forall (R : Type) (Rzero Rone : R) (Rplus Rmult Rminus : R -> R -> R) (Ropp : R -> R), ring_theory Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq -> monoid_theory (PL22 Rplus) (ZE_22 Rzero)
M22mult_monoid : forall (R : Type) (Rzero Rone : R) (Rplus Rmult Rminus : R -> R -> R) (Ropp : R -> R), ring_theory Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq -> monoid_theory (MU22 Rplus Rmult) (ID_22 Rzero Rone)
Z.div_opp_r_nz : forall a b : Z, b <> 0%Z -> (a mod b)%Z <> 0%Z -> (a / - b)%Z = (- (a / b) - 1)%Z
Z.div_opp_l_nz : forall a b : Z, b <> 0%Z -> (a mod b)%Z <> 0%Z -> (- a / b)%Z = (- (a / b) - 1)%Z
M22plus_zero : forall (R : Type) (Rzero Rone : R) (Rplus Rmult Rminus : R -> R -> R) (Ropp : R -> R), ring_theory Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq -> forall m : M22 R, PL22 Rplus (ZE_22 Rzero) m = m
M22scal_zero : forall (R : Type) (Rzero Rone : R) (Rplus Rmult Rminus : R -> R -> R) (Ropp : R -> R), ring_theory Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq -> forall x : M22 R, M22scal Rmult Rzero x = ZE_22 Rzero
BinIntDef.Z.opp = fun x : Z => match x with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos x0 => Z.neg x0 | Z.neg x0 => Z.pos x0 end : Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.opp _%Z_scope
M22scal_MI22 : forall (R : Type) (Rzero Rone : R) (Rplus Rmult Rminus : R -> R -> R) (Ropp : R -> R), ring_theory Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq -> forall x : M22 R, M22scal Rmult (Ropp Rone) x = MI22 Ropp x
M22mult_one_r : forall (R : Type) (Rzero Rone : R) (Rplus Rmult Rminus : R -> R -> R) (Ropp : R -> R), ring_theory Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq -> forall x : M22 R, MU22 Rplus Rmult x (ID_22 Rzero Rone) = x
M22minus : forall (R : Type) (Rzero Rone : R) (Rplus Rmult Rminus : R -> R -> R) (Ropp : R -> R), ring_theory Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq -> forall x : M22 R, PL22 Rplus x (MI22 Ropp x) = ZE_22 Rzero
M22mult_one_l : forall (R : Type) (Rzero Rone : R) (Rplus Rmult Rminus : R -> R -> R) (Ropp : R -> R), ring_theory Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq -> forall x : M22 R, MU22 Rplus Rmult (ID_22 Rzero Rone) x = x
M22plus_comm : forall (R : Type) (Rzero Rone : R) (Rplus Rmult Rminus : R -> R -> R) (Ropp : R -> R), ring_theory Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq -> forall x y : M22 R, PL22 Rplus x y = PL22 Rplus y x
Zmod_0_r : forall a : Z, (a mod 0)%Z = 0%Z
Z.sub_diag : forall n : Z, (n - n)%Z = 0%Z
Zdiv_0_r : forall a : Z, (a / 0)%Z = 0%Z
M22plus_cancel : forall (R : Type) (Rzero Rone : R) (Rplus Rmult Rminus : R -> R -> R) (Ropp : R -> R), ring_theory Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq -> forall x a b : M22 R, PL22 Rplus x a = PL22 Rplus x b -> a = b
M22_opp_mult_r : forall (R : Type) (Rzero Rone : R) (Rplus Rmult Rminus : R -> R -> R) (Ropp : R -> R), ring_theory Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq -> forall x y : M22 R, MU22 Rplus Rmult x (MI22 Ropp y) = MI22 Ropp (MU22 Rplus Rmult x y)
M22_opp_mult_l : forall (R : Type) (Rzero Rone : R) (Rplus Rmult Rminus : R -> R -> R) (Ropp : R -> R), ring_theory Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq -> forall x y : M22 R, MU22 Rplus Rmult (MI22 Ropp x) y = MI22 Ropp (MU22 Rplus Rmult x y)
BinIntDef.Z.div_eucl = fun a b : Z => match a with | 0%Z => (0%Z, 0%Z) | Z.pos a' => match b with | 0%Z => (0%Z, 0%Z) | Z.pos _ => BinIntDef.Z.pos_div_eucl a' b | Z.neg b' => let (q, r) := BinIntDef.Z.pos_div_eucl a' (Z.pos b') in match r with | 0%Z => ((- q)%Z, 0%Z) | _ => ((- (q + 1))%Z, (b + r)%Z) end end | Z.neg a' => match b with | 0%Z => (0%Z, 0%Z) | Z.pos _ => let (q, r) := BinIntDef.Z.pos_div_eucl a' b in match r with | 0%Z => ((- q)%Z, 0%Z) | _ => ((- (q + 1))%Z, (b - r)%Z) end | Z...
